CustomField.description: [EBH] (EPH-5625) - to capture exit code Sellers that are "Marketing Blacklist = TRUE" will be flagged "Exit Code" = "02" If not, Sellers that have 0 Contacts with "Marketing Opt-in" will be flagged "Member Status" = "30) If not, percentage of "Control Group Size (%)" Sellers will be flagged as "Exit Code" = "10" Otherwise, all remaining Sellers are set to "Exit Code" = "20"
CustomField.label: Exit Code
